response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $800,000. This offer is tailored to reflect its true worth while providing you with a substantial savings compared to its market value of $1,000,000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 800000}
